ModMetaData.name: [CF] Arellian, the Militant Cat Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: ChemFuel
ModMetaData.description:
[BETA] RimWorld 1.6 – Arellian, the Militant Cat Xenotype
This mod is a beta-test build for the upcoming RimWorld 1.6 update, built with full DLC support in mind. It’s unstable, incomplete, and gets monthly updates (if lucky) — maybe YOU should try making mods in the ROK Army...
[What's in?]
1. Complete overhaul of...well, basically everything? 2. New gear, lore, and mechanics in testing 3. Groundwork for compatibility – with and without Ideology, Royalty, and Anomaly. The mod will be functional with only Biotech active (but some contents are DLC-locked for obvious reasons).
[What's coming?]
1. Full Arellian everything : backstories, weapons, apparel, drugs, furniture and so much more! 2. Probably more bugs. What can I say?
The Arellian Empire strikes back.
